GSD.product_version: versions from v3.8 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
ext4: fix race condition between ext4_write and ext4_convert_inline_data

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 725e00cb7039eae291890f1bb19bc867176745f6, it was introduced in version v3.8 by commit 0c8d414f163f5d35e43a4de7a6e5ee8c253fcccf. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ext4: fix race condition between ext4_write and ext4_convert_inline_data
